activities: U.S. - EU Safe Harbor Privacy Statement For personal information of employees, consumers, healthcare professionals, medical research subjects and investigators, customers, investors, and government officials that ABLE Office Services, LLC receives from the European Economic Area, ABLE Office Services, LLC has committed to handling such personal information in accordance with the Safe Harbor Principles. ABLE Office Services, LLC’s Safe Harbor certification can be found at https://safeharbor.export.gov/list.aspx.
